body.name: French Bilingual Bridge: Classic Science Fiction Stories for Beginners (Bilingual Bridge: dual-language books for adult language learners)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 36 mins
body.description: These exciting French short stories for beginners feature illustrated classic science fiction, with side-by-side bilingual English and French.--French Bilingual Bridge: Classic Science Fiction Stories for Beginners offers a unique way to practice reading French. With the side-by-side bilingual writing, you’ll never be lost again. You don’t need to leave the book to look up a word, interrupting the story.This easy and low-pressure approach adapts well to incremental improvement. You’ll be pleased and surprised at how much less you look at the English side by the end of the third story!These French stories for language learners have been adapted specifically for those reading at beginner to intermediate levels, mapped to A2-B1 on the Common European Framework of Reference (CEFR).In this book you will find:Three classic and beloved science fiction stories, shortened and adapted to simple language:FrankensteinTwenty Thousand Leagues Under The SeaWar of the WorldsA variety of tenses, to allow you to practice past, present, and future conjugationsAccessible grammar and sentence structures, designed for beginner language learnersIllustrationsManual translations by a professional translator--By learning through reading fun short stories with translations, you will naturally pick up a variety of vocabulary and sentence structures without ever feeling frustrated and stuck. Enjoy the ease of reading for pleasure in French! Read more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kindle format keeps it at your fingertips wherever you go If you opt for the Kindle ebook version, you gain the most control over the font size. When learning a new word, try using the search function to find other sentence structures using the same word.Make highlights and electronic notes for yourself as you go. A printed copy makes a wonderful gift Each of the three stories is shortened and simplified to make your reading practice feel like pure fun, while honoring the original literary essence that has made them timeless classics. This high-quality book includes: Manual translations by professional translatorCustom illustrations to enhance the stories' drama Progress seamlessly with side-by-side bilingual stories Printed copies make it easy to write notes to yourself on new vocabulary or sentences structures. Scribble in the margins or write notes in the provided Notes section in the back. Paragraph-by-paragraph bilingual print French is printed in darker text than the English, to encourage your eyes to keep to the French side. Look at the translations as often as you need, without leaving the page. By the end of the story you'll find that you have to look far less often at the English side! Large print font makes it easier for the eyes to track. Kindle ebook option Hardcover and paperback available Open book view Close up view

A little bit about the author While I did briefly teach English as a second language, I'm not a professional language teacher or academic. I am a mom and a corporate exec who works with people from all over the world, and I've studied several languages myself. I developed this approach of combining stories with bilingual formatting, especially for people like me who study language for enjoyment. I hope you find it similarly practical and easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good way to practice reading in French
reviews.reviewText: I have found reading short stories to be a good way to practice reading in French. This was a good challenge for me. Not too hard, but a good way to learn new words in an enjoyable way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I’ve been looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased a lot of intro to French books and this was the first one that really hit the mark. The stories are familiar, but interesting, and the author chooses common simple words in her summaries / translations with ample repetition to help with learning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A FUN WAY TO LEARN!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this wanting to re-fresh my 40-year old and never used college French. It was perfect for that and GREAT FUN!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the first bilingual book I've read, and I truly enjoyed it. I started studying French three weeks ago and picked this book to read as part of my immersion into all things French. This book was very helpful and gave me the needed confidence of having both French and English side by side as I read the pages of the stories. Excellent learning tool and wonderful classic stories of Frankenstein, Captain Nemo, and War of the Worlds. It is absolutely worth reading, and I would recommend the book to anyone studying French, or English, because it works for both since it's bilingual!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love it, great content, well-written and thought-provoking. I can leave a review in French as well hahaJ'aime beaucoup, contenu magnifique, bien-ecrit and provoquant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What an amazing way to learn and practice french
reviews.reviewText: If you are trying to practice your French, this is an excellent book for beginners. the story itself it so exciting and well written. I enjoyed reading every bit of it. A must have for dual language kids, teens and adults. Excellent job!
Very helpful for a beginner that wants to practice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: So useful to brush up on your French!
reviews.reviewText: This has been a valuable resource in helping me refresh and enhance my French language skills. The unique blend of classic science fiction stories with bilingual text not only makes language learning engaging but also caters to learners of various levels. It's a misconception that you have to be a beginner to enjoy this book; in fact, I found that even as an advanced learner, I could appreciate the carefully selected stories and effectively brush up on my vocabulary and comprehension. It's a versatile tool that anyone looking to improve their French can benefit from, regardless of their proficiency level.

I am a French speaker and I had to learn English growing up. Living in Canada and in America in general, it is pretty essential let me tell you!I have never had a book where I could compare both english and French on the same page. This book is really helpfull and super well made. Short sentences and a Nice variety of vocabulary. Very useful for visual people as well.I recommande this book for sure! Je recommande à tout ceux qui veulent apprendre à lire en français, mais aussi pour les francophones qui désirent apprendre à lire en anglais, il s’agit d’un bon ouvrage de départ!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a little French, but like many people I don't practice enough. What a perfect way to do it! You don't feel like you're actually 'working' because the author uses great, classic stories to read in both languages (English and French), so you're constantly double-checking your proficiency. I highly recommend this book and look forward to more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A unique way to practice reading French
reviews.reviewText: This beautifully illustrated book is a source of accessible grammar and sentence structures. It makes reading easy and funny.I liked the Twenty Thousand leagues under the sea.Great book for beginners.
